titleStmt.title: The life of that reverend divine, and learned historian, Dr. Thomas Fuller
titleStmt.author: Fell, John, 1625-1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.W., H.B. and H.M.,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The life of Dr. Thomas Fuller.
Cf. Proceedings and papers (Oxford Bibliographical Society); v. 4, pt. 1.
Wing lists title as: The life and death of that reverend divine.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
